Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in enhancing your experience and productivity. Given its high value and quality, I propose a price of $10,000 for you to consider. This offer allows you to benefit from the full potential of the product while ensuring a fair return on my part. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
